author: ndbeyer
msg: Rework Objects and Threads interfaces; implement sun.misc.Unsafe in terms of Threads and Objects.

author: danielf
msg: * Inheritance of properties in block context from parent context partly implemented.

* Created a sub container in the block servlet to get block local resources resolved relative the local block context. It seem to work for the Spring resolver, but I don't understand how to make it work with the Avalon resolver yet.
* Some cleanup and bug fixes for the sitemap servlet.
